DOC.brief_title: Clinical Pathway With `` Fast-Track '' In Uncomplicated Acute Appendicitis
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose uncomplicated acute appendicitis urgently . Signing consent participation commitment attend review . Suspected liver disease . Coagulation disorder . Patients septic shock . Pregnant patient . Patients symptoms compatible acute uncomplicated appendicitis ( plastron appendix , perforate appendicitis diffuse peritonitis ) , 5 day evolution ) . No sign consent participation .
